segments.text: Excuse me , sir.Is there a barber near here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , the nearest one is at the third cross of this road .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm a stranger here.How can I get there , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just walk down the road for a few minutes , and you'll find it on your right .
segments.speaker: S2
